description: Nathaniel Edwin Clyne (born 5 April 1991) is an English footballer who plays as a right back for Liverpool. He began his career at Crystal Palace, playing regularly in four Championship seasons before a move to Southampton, where he contested three seasons in the Premier League. He joined Liverpool in July 2015 on a five-year contract for a fee of Â£12.5 million. Formerly an international at under-19 and under-21 level, Clyne made his senior international debut for England in November 2014.
name: Nathaniel Clyne
